keyMoments.title: Sanji's Rage Over Nami's Forced Wedding
keyMoments.description: Upon learning about Absalom's forced wedding to Nami and his previous spying on her, Sanji erupts in an intense, fiery rage that causes him to literally burst into flames.
keyMoments.significance: This iconic moment became known among fans as 'Sanji's Super Saiyan mode' and later inspired his post-timeskip Hell Memories technique.
keyMoments.quote: That bastard... I'll never forgive him for what he did to Nami-san!

keyMoments.title: Decimating Zombie Forces
keyMoments.description: An enraged Sanji charges through Thriller Bark alongside Luffy, cutting through dozens of zombies with overwhelming force.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's combat prowess when motivated by protecting his crewmates.

keyMoments.title: Stopped by Negative Hollow
keyMoments.description: Perona's Negative Hollow ghosts pass through Sanji, draining his will and causing him to lament having a soul as bad as his curly eyebrows.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even Sanji's intense rage can be neutralized by Perona's psychological attack.
keyMoments.quote: My soul is as bad as my curly eyebrows...

reveals.information: Sanji's protective rage can manifest as literal flames, previewing his future Hell Memories technique

relationships.description: Sanji's protective devotion to Nami reaches explosive levels when learning of Absalom's forced wedding.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji erupts in fiery rage upon learning of Absalom's actions toward Nami.

keyMoments.title: Oars Awakens and Explores Thriller Bark
keyMoments.description: The massive Special Zombie Oars awakens with Luffy's shadow and begins exploring Thriller Bark, yelling for food and marveling at the ship's size.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Oars as the primary threat in Moria's zombie army, possessing Luffy's personality but not his Devil Fruit abilities.

keyMoments.title: Separating the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Oars leaps from the mast, causing Luffy, Chopper, and Robin to separate from Usopp and Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Unintentionally divides the Straw Hat forces, creating new confrontation dynamics.

keyMoments.title: Unable to Stretch Like Luffy
keyMoments.description: Despite having Luffy's shadow, Oars' giant corpse body doesn't stretch when he tries to use Luffy's abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that shadows transfer personality and memories but not Devil Fruit powers.

statusHistory.reason: Reanimated by Gecko Moria with Luffy's shadow

reveals.information: Oars possesses Luffy's personality and memories but cannot use Devil Fruit stretching abilities
Oars the Continent-Puller lived over 500 years ago and was reanimated as Zombie #900

keyMoments.title: Negative Hollow Neutralizes Luffy and Sanji
keyMoments.description: Perona deploys her Negative Hollow ghosts against Luffy and Sanji, completely draining their will and causing them to collapse in extreme negativity.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the devastating effectiveness of her psychological attack against even the strongest physical fighters.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Oars is Uncontrollable
keyMoments.description: Perona learns that Oars is not under Moria's control and is acting independently due to Luffy's strong-willed shadow.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the challenge of controlling powerful zombies with strong personalities.

abilities.description: Perona sends out ghosts that drain the will of anyone they pass through, causing extreme negativity and self-loathing.

reveals.information: Negative Hollows can neutralize even powerful fighters like Luffy and Sanji

keyMoments.title: Decimating Zombie Forces
keyMoments.description: Luffy charges through Thriller Bark with Sanji, cutting through dozens of zombies with overwhelming force.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's combat prowess against Moria's zombie army.

keyMoments.title: Stopped by Negative Hollow
keyMoments.description: Perona's Negative Hollow ghosts pass through Luffy, causing him to wish he could be reborn as a mosquito.
keyMoments.significance: Shows even Luffy can be completely neutralized by psychological attacks.
keyMoments.quote: I want to be reborn... as a mosquito...

keyMoments.title: Excited About Seeing Oars with His Shadow
keyMoments.description: Despite the danger, Luffy expresses excitement about seeing how cool Oars is while using his shadow.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Luffy's unique perspective and enthusiasm even in dire circumstances.
keyMoments.quote: I want to see how cool Oars is with my shadow!

keyMoments.title: Frustrated with Absalom's Wedding
keyMoments.description: Dr. Hogback becomes frustrated that Absalom is holding a wedding ceremony, disrupting their operations, and assumes command as second-in-charge of zombie forces.
keyMoments.significance: Shows tension within Thriller Bark leadership and establishes Hogback's increased role.

keyMoments.title: Admiring Oars' Strength
keyMoments.description: Hogback admires Oars' incredible physical strength with confidence in their victory.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the villains' overconfidence in Oars as an unstoppable weapon.

reveals.information: Hogback becomes second-in-command of Thriller Bark's zombie forces

keyMoments.title: Plans to Break Oars for Control
keyMoments.description: Moria explains he needs to 'break' Oars first before the giant zombie can be properly controlled due to Luffy's strong-willed shadow.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the challenge of controlling powerful zombies with strong personalities.

keyMoments.title: Sadistic Pleasure at Oars' Power
keyMoments.description: Moria laughs with sadistic pleasure at the destruction Oars is capable of causing.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Moria's confidence and sadistic nature.

keyMoments.title: Distributes Salt to Purify Zombies
keyMoments.description: Usopp provides bags of salt to each crew member, explaining that salt can purify zombies by extracting their shadows.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the crew with crucial tactical advantage against Moria's zombie army.
keyMoments.quote: This salt will purify the zombies and free their shadows!
